content: available in * english * german * french a basic glove pattern fitting women s l or men s s the cable on the wrist adds some interest but can be left out if you don t feel like doing cables downsizing use a gauge of 36sts/4inches to get a women s m 17cm circumference to make the cable really pop out avoid multicolored yarns stay with semi solids in light colors the darker the yarn the less shadows the colorwork will have = the less it will be visible the cable pattern is included as a chart
